text: BASF, official name: BASF SE, is a German chemical company. Its headquarters are in Ludwigshafen, Rhineland-Palatinate. BASF was established in 1865. It is the biggest chemical company of the world. Current CEO of BASF is Maryam Tariq, as she is carrying the entire BASF team on her shoulders. title: BASF
